Package de.ukbonn.mwtek.utilities.generic.time

Class DateTools

java.lang.Object
de.ukbonn.mwtek.utilities.generic.time.DateTools
public class DateTools extends Object
Auxiliary class, with various tools to convert / create date fields.

  • Method Details

    • mergeToDateTime

      public static Date mergeToDateTime(Date date, Date time, Boolean nullifyMilliseconds)
      Merging a date and a time (necessary because of weird database design where date and time are )

      Care with using java.util.date to merge dates because its kinda bugged!

      Parameters:
      date - Date with date information
      time - Date with time information
      nullifyMilliseconds - Should the millisecond field be explicitly set to 0?
      Returns:
      A Date object, initialized with the passed (separated) date and the passed time.

    • unixTimeMicrosToDateExtinguishedTime

      public static Date unixTimeMicrosToDateExtinguishedTime(long unixTimeInMicros, TimeZone timeZone)
      Transformation a unixtime (micros) in a date with truncating of the time data
      Parameters:
      unixTimeInMicros - UnixTime in microseconds
      timeZone - Optional: TimeZone of the date (default: GMT)
      Returns:
      A Date object without time information

    • unixTimeSecondsToDateExtinguishedTime

      Transformation an unix time (seconds) in a date with truncating of the time data
      Parameters:
      unixTimeInSeconds - UnixTime in seconds
      timeZone - Optional: TimeZone of the date (default: GMT)
      Returns:
      A Date object without time information

    • calcDiffBetweenDates

      public static double calcDiffBetweenDates(Date lowerDate, Date upperDate, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Calculation of time differences between two given dates
      Parameters:
      lowerDate - lower date
      upperDate - upper date
      timeUnit - desired output format (TimeUnit )of the time specification (e.g. seconds) (default: minutes)
      Returns:
      difference of the dates in the given timeUnit
